snippet: More investors were hedging against potential further losses, causing stocks to slide for a fifth day in six.
abstract: Stocks fall for the fifth day in six as investors keep their focus on the turmoil in Europe.
lead_paragraph: More investors were hedging against potential further losses, causing stocks to slide for a fifth day in six.

headline.seo: Concern Over Europe Pulls Stocks Down Again
headline.main: Concern Over Europe Pulls Shares Down Again
headline.print_headline: Concern Over Europe Pulls Shares Down Again
